item.name: get_archive_backup
item.description: Check backup frequency e.g. 1 = maximum number of days between archive backups, ARC_{$DSN}_D, where "D" = Daily and 2 is period in number of days that you want to check

item.name: get_daily_backup
item.description: Check backup frequency e.g. 2 = maximum number of days between day backups, DBS_{$DSN}_D, where "D" = Daily and 7 is period in number of days that you want to check

item.name: get_db_status
item.description: Check database status (open_mode='READ WRITE' and database_role = 'PRIMARY') or (open_mode='MOUNT' and database_role = 'PHYSICAL STANDBY')

item.name: get_monthly_backup
item.description: Check backup frequency e.g. 32 = maximum number of days between day backups, DBS_{$DSN}_M, where "M" = Monthly and 62 is period in number of days that you want to check

item.name: get_weekly_backup
item.description: Check backup frequency e.g. 4 = maximum number of days between week backups, DBS_{$DSN}_W, where "W" = Weekly and 35 is period in number of days that you want to check

item.name: get_yearly_backup
item.description: Check backup frequency e.g. 367 = maximum number of days between year backups, DBS_{$DSN}_Y, where "Y" = Yearly and 722 is period in number of days that you want to check

item.name: get_phio_datafile_reads
item.params: select to_char(sum(decode(name,'physical reads direct',value,0))) FROM V$SYSSTAT where name ='physical reads direct'

item.name: get_phio_datafile_writes
item.params: select to_char(sum(decode(name,'physical writes direct',value,0))) FROM V$SYSSTAT where name ='physical writes direct'

item.name: get_phio_redo_writes
item.params: select to_char(sum(decode(name,'redo writes',value,0))) FROM V$SYSSTAT where name ='redo writes'

item.name: get_db_status_stdby
item.description: Check database status (open_mode='READ WRITE' and database_role = 'PRIMARY') or (open_mode='MOUNT' and database_role = 'PHYSICAL STANDBY')

discovery_rule.name: dis_tablespaces
discovery_rule.description: Detection of all tablespaces in the Oracle database.

discovery_rule.name: dis_topbufferget
discovery_rule.description: Top 5 Queries - Ordered by buffer gets

discovery_rule.name: dis_topcputime
discovery_rule.description: Top 5 Queries - Ordered by CPU time

discovery_rule.name: dis_topdiskread
discovery_rule.description: Top 5 Queries - Ordered by disk reads

discovery_rule.name: dis_topelapsedtime
discovery_rule.description: Top 5 Queries - Ordered by elapsed time

discovery_rule.name: dis_topgetexec
discovery_rule.description: Top 5 Queries - Ordered by gets per execution

discovery_rule.name: dis_topreadexec
discovery_rule.description: Top 5 Queries - Ordered by disk reads per execution
